name: Rei
description:
A really basic tiny Metroidvania for Tiny Metroidvania Jam (1/19/2019-1/20/2019). Made mostly to teach myself new stuff, to make something out of my comfort zone, and to actually try and do a New Year's Resolution lbr. There was going to be more, but I'm only one person with 24 hours. I included the .zip just in case the one embed in this page decides to be troublesome.

If I ever update this, I'll make a separate upload, as this is the Game Jam entry.

Known Issues (0.5):

  • No music/sounds.
  • No animations and basic QOL stuff.
  • Non-stationary enemies give player enormous knockback.
  • In certain instances, physics just go way out of whack and prevents progression (super sorry if you run into this)
  • Performance may be different depending on the computer/browser.
  • Player will sometimes stick to the walls.
  • In some instances, player can pass or get stuck in walls.
  • There is a movement exploit that can be done after getting two power-ups, which allows the player to go anywhere they want.
